items.name: Burrata Caprese
items.description: Creamy burrata, heirloom tomatoes, fresh basil, and a balsamic glaze.

items.name: Tuna Tartare
items.description: Ahi tuna, avocado, soy-lime dressing, and crispy wontons.

items.name: Grilled Octopus
items.description: Tender grilled octopus with a lemon-herb vinaigrette and fingerling potatoes.

items.name: Filet Mignon
items.description: 8oz center-cut filet, potato gratin, asparagus, and a red wine reduction.

items.name: Pan-Seared Scallops
items.description: Jumbo scallops served with a saffron risotto and citrus butter sauce.

items.name: Mushroom Risotto
items.description: Creamy Arborio rice with wild mushrooms, parmesan, and truffle oil.

items.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
items.description: Warm chocolate cake with a molten center, served with raspberry coulis and vanilla ice cream.

items.name: Classic Tiramisu
items.description: Layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream, dusted with cocoa powder.

items.name: Old Fashioned
items.description: Bourbon, bitters, sugar, and an orange peel.

items.name: House Red Wine
items.description: A glass of our carefully selected Cabernet Sauvignon.
